channel.title: Emote buttons and Cases
channel.description:
Hey, I'm using my emote buttons as teleports. There's only cases for the first 12 buttons, but I want to use more.
Does anyone know them specifically or how I can find them?

item.title: Emote buttons and Cases
item.dc:creator: @kmansnoob kmansnoob
item.description:
@kmansnoob wrote:

I found them, but what do I do with them?

All of the other ones are in client.java under “case 162”, “case 174” etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Emote buttons and Cases
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

If you would want to use the rest of them, then you’re going to have to find their action button IDs.

Read full topic

item.title: Emote buttons and Cases
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Use this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,329714.msg2577344.html#msg2577344 read the last post by The Reaper X. This was when I needed help with this. That topic talks about adding commands on the quest tabs, but it’s the same purpose as the emote buttons. Don’t post on it because it’s old. Tell me if it helped you.

Read full topic
